00022                 0.003 * GeV, /* mass */
00023                 0, /* width */
00024                 0, /* charge */
00025                 0, /* 2*spin */

00033                 0, /* baryon number */
00034                 622, /* PDG encoding */
00035                 true, /* stable */
00036                 0, /*DBL_MIN,*//* lifetime (may be overridden by predefined decay time) */
00037                 0, /* decay table */
00038                 false /* short lived */
